bug.author: nyghtowl
bug.description: TestCanovaDataSetFunctions.testCanovaDataSetFunction:96 expected:<4> but was:<0> BagOfWordsVectorizerTest.testBagOfWordsVectorizer:111 expected:<1.0> but was:<0.0> TfidfVectorizerTest.testTfIdfVectorizer:104 expected:<0.0> but was:<1.0> GloveTest.testGloVe1:121 null SequenceVectorsTest.testGlove1:322 null TestSerialization.testModelSerde:57 Â» IndexOutOfBounds 12

comments.comment: Note TestCanovaDataSetFunctions issue is the same as: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/DataVec/issues/2>deeplearning4j/DataVec#2</denchmark-link>
I'll take care of dl4j-nlp tests, hasn't noticed failures there...
I am looking at the Serialization test.

BoW & TF-IDF errors can be ignored for now, got them fixed but not merged - just filesystem sorting issue. But GloVe issue isn't fixed and can't find root of the problem yet. Code wasn't changed since original rewrite, but it's just not working. Looking for hidden linked changes now.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
